code: import React from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route,Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{AuthProvider}from'./contexts/AuthContext';import{AppProvider}from'./contexts/AppContext';import Layout from'./components/layout/Layout';import Login from'./pages/Login';import Dashboard from'./pages/Dashboard';import InwardModule from'./pages/InwardModule';import QualityModule from'./pages/QualityModule';import ApprovalModule from'./pages/ApprovalModule';import ReportsModule from'./pages/ReportsModule';import ProtectedRoute from'./components/auth/ProtectedRoute';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Route,{element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Layout,{}),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/inward",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{roles:['INWARD_CLERK','SUPERADMIN'],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InwardModule,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/quality",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{roles:['QUALITY_CHECKER','SUPERADMIN'],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QualityModule,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/approval",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{roles:['APPROVER','SUPERADMIN'],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ApprovalModule,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/reports",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{roles:['INWARD_CLERK','QUALITY_CHECKER','APPROVER','SUPERADMIN'],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReportsModule,{})})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"*",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/"})})]})})})});export default App;
